data.message: Why all the hate?!?  Like fine you don't like Marshall fine just gtfo this page then n let the real fans enjoy ❤ all this negative shit just annoying.  Like em is the best 👍💯 like I can't exolain.  I've been a fan for my whole life and if he does sumthin I don't like I'm not gonna hate on him I'm gonna go through with him his decision his life like especially the whole Trump I give him fuckin props on that that shit took balls lmao and if u gonna hate on him for it you truly were never a fan to begin with.  Love this man more than anything in the world.  He deserves more respect.
